Giacomo Rebonato

Maker, web developer, musician

ContactsAbout

My name?

The name that my parents gave me is Giacomo.
I was born in Verona, Italy in 1983.
There I am also well known as Mino.
Since 2015 I am based in Dublin, Ireland where I find easier to introduce myself as Jack to English speakers.

Where can I find you?

You can email me at grebonato@outlook.ie
I am a very easy going person, if you invite me out for a chat and a glass of wine... I'll probably say yes.

I am still on Facebook.

I am also onTwitter, but I don't tweet much.

This is my footer!
